name: Bird Gregor 2
description:
This game is about the bird Gregor, who finds himself on another planet. He discovers an alien base inhabited by cat-like creatures - Topics. Solving various tasks, he tries to activate alien structures and fly to his ship.

Controls:

TAB - Tasks, Objectives;

left mouse button - Strike
